department: Depatment of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of mooring bollards specific to the port of Cap-aux-Meules.

=================

**Tender Description**

PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, invites submissions for the acquisition of mooring bollards for the port of Cap-aux-Meules as part of the maintenance program for port facilities, as outlined in Annex A. 

Submission deadline is August 22, 2023, at 14:00:00, with a preferred response deadline listed as None (strike through it).
